com.elvenware.codebox
Class StringBox

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.elvenware.codebox.StringBox
public final class StringBox
extends java.lang.Object

A class full of static methods for performing various utility functions We can't do this by inheriting from String because string is declared final. An alternative, would be to create our own string class, but that would mean we might introduce bugs, or miss out on updates to String. Because we have declared this class final, and have made all the methods static and final, the compiler will inline all these methods, making them much faster than if they were part of a regular object.
